1269960.name: Inferno Wizards
1269960.description:
Capture Wizard Towers

Wizard towers can be captured by holding the first floor. When a tower is captured, the owners' new name shows up on the leaderboard. Other players can capture the tower, which steals the tower away from the existing player.

Kill Players

Kill other players to gain XP, make it to the top of the leaderboard, and become the strongest player on the server! Team up with friends!

Upgrade New Spells

Each level you gain a skill point that can be used to unlock and upgrade new spells.

Destroy Huts, Houses, Monsters, and World Bosses

Huts and houses spawn NPCs. Kill the spawns to control where on the map XP is available. Kill monsters to gain XP. Stronger world bosses give a larger amount of XP.

Quests

Quests introduce the mechanics of the game, unlock abilities, and offer an alternative route to gain levels and XP.

More Updates Coming Soon!

Xbox Controller Support

Join the discord for more updates and info!

All feedback is welcome!
